ctx: intros a b c Ha Hb Hc H1 H2.
intros a b c Ha Hb Hc H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : nat Ha : a > 0 Hb : b > 0 Hc : c > 0 H1 : CoPrime a c H2 : CoPrime b c Unable to unify "exists q : nat, ?M1412 = ?M1410 * ?M1411 * q" with "common_div (Z.of_nat (a * b)) (Z.of_nat c) 1 /\\ (forall e : nat, common_div (Z.of_nat (a * b)) (Z.of_nat c) e -> e <= 1)".

original: intros a b c Ha Hb Hc H1 H2. unfold CoPrime. intros Hprime1 Hprime2. apply coPrimeMult2. - apply Hprime1. - apply Hprime2. - unfold Divides. exists c. reflexivity. - unfold Divides. exists c. reflexivity.
